About.label: About
About.title: About Me
About.paragraph1: I'm a front-end developer with a deep interest in modern web technologies, UI animations, and interactive user experiences. I work with React, Next.js, TypeScript, GSAP, Lenis, integrate external services (Cloudflare Stream, Stripe, Calendly), and optimize performance and design down to the pixel.
About.paragraph2: I have experience with Bubble.io, creating scalable no-code solutions with logic, dynamic filters, and custom interactions.
About.paragraph3: In my work, I value code cleanliness, logic, aesthetics, and efficiency. I constantly improve — from precise element positioning to building complex JavaScript architectures. I love when an interface doesn't just work, but comes alive.

work1.title: Front-End Developer
work1.description: Developing modern web applications with React and Next.js. Creating interactive interfaces with animations, API integration, and third-party services. Optimizing performance and UX.

work2.title: Bubble.io Developer
work2.description: Building scalable no-code applications on Bubble.io platform. Creating complex workflows, dynamic filters, external API integration, and custom logic configuration.

education1.title: Self-education & Courses
education1.description: Continuous learning through online courses, documentation, and developer communities. Focus on modern technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, GSAP, animations, and UX design.
